message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I understand that $80 is a great price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Alice, thank you for the counteroffer! I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $85. Would you be willing to meet me at $82?
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to go down to $82. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $84. Would you be willing to accept that?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable going up to $84. Would you be willing to go down to $81?
Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit hesitant to go back and forth anymore. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $83. This is as low as I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to accept that?
